Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1320.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCerberusGameChapter/FxUiCerberusGameChapterLizi01.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Day by day, time flowed on, and day by day, the wind grew bolder and wilder.'}
{3: 'The air turned crisp, the grasses faded from green to gold. Autumn had settled over the land, and winter drew near.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCerberusGameChapter/FxUiCerberusGameChapterLizi01.prefab'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Once more, the maiden gifted particles of her own light to kindle life anew, then sank gently onto the fading grass.'}
{3: 'The little gray raven fluttered about her anxiously, but could do nothing to help.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Maiden', 3: 'Do not blame yourself, my little gray raven... Your company alone is a comfort to me.', 4: '1', 18: '100013190'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Maybe this was not how it should be, thought the little gray raven.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-2', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In another world somewhere, it would have wings broad enough to wrap around the maiden, to shield her from the biting gales.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}

{1: 'In another world somewhere, it would have gentle hands, like hers, to wipe the tears from her eyes and paint a smile upon her face.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Perhaps it was in a distant past, or perhaps in a future far, far away.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'That world would not be so harsh, so lonely as this.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: 'Maiden', 3: "Because I'm still waiting...", 4: '1', 18: '100013192'}
{2: 'Waiting for what?', 3: '35'}
{2: 'Maiden', 3: "Hmm... I can't remember anymore... It's been so long... so very long...", 4: '1', 18: '100013193'}
{3: "A soft mist of confusion clouded the maiden's gaze."}
{2: 'Maiden', 3: 'Maybe I stayed for these scattered pages... worried these wounded little ones would never find their way home.', 4: '1', 18: '100013194'}
{2: 'Maiden', 3: 'The wind grows colder... little gray raven, you should fly home now, before it sweeps you too far away.', 4: '1', 18: '100013195'}
{2: "It's been so long... so very long...", 3: '45'}
{3: 'The little gray raven echoed her words, answering with feigned solemnity. It circled around her, refusing to leave her side.'}
{3: 'The little gray raven circled around her in silence, refusing to leave her side.'}
{2: 'Maiden', 3: 'Come then... let me hold you close, that we may keep each other warm.', 4: '1', 18: '100013197'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: '——The Maiden of Eden IV——', 3: '80', 6: '1'}
{3: '——The Maiden of Eden IV——'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'A wind far too brisk for early morning whispers beside your ears.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory751.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'A soft touch caresses your cheek...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What were you dreaming about? You look like you want to drift back to sleep.', 4: '1', 18: '100013199'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Sunlight streams into the room as Liv gently wipes your face with a warm towel.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab'}
{2: 'I can do it myself.', 3: '84', 4: '(Lie back and let Liv continue)', 5: '87'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Let me take care of it. We should hurry. I have something I want to do with you today.', 4: '1', 18: '100013200'}
{3: 'She seems to be in high spirits, humming a cheerful little tune.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Ah... lying back down again, are we?', 4: '1', 18: '100013201'}
{3: 'In a flash, she catches you back into her arms and continues gently dabbing your face with the towel.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'No sleeping in today! We should hurry. I have something I want to do with you.', 4: '1', 18: '100013202'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1322.jpg'}
{3: 'A gray aircraft has also "arrived" at your destination.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'You rub the sleep from your eyes, struggling to piece together the situation before you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory751.jpg'}
{3: 'In a drowsy stupor, you washed up, got dressed, were practically fed an overly generous breakfast...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1322.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1322.jpg'}
{3: '...and then led to this nearby hillside—all while barely conscious.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'And the "mastermind" behind it all is none other than the girl now smiling at you with sparkling eyes.'}
{2: 'So... what exactly did we come here for?', 3: '117'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The wind is rising... Can you feel it?', 4: '1', 18: '100013204'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{3: 'She turns slightly, gazing at the vast sea of clouds behind her, where a lone windmill stands tall against the sky like a solitary deity.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Humidity and heat cling to your clothes as the sunlight blazes almost too bright to bear. For one beautifully hazy moment, the entire scene freezes, as if captured on a single frame of film.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCerberusGameChapter/FxUiCerberusGameChapterLizi01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Then, a powerful gust of wind sweeps through.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1322.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Bathed in the rushing air, the girl seems to shimmer, as though at any moment she might drift away with the wind and dissolve into the distant sky.'}
{2: "(Take Liv's hand)", 3: '145'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCerberusGameChapter/FxUiCerberusGameChapterLizi01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiturntable/FxUiturntable01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab'}
{3: '"I felt like... the wind might carry you away." ...There\'s no way you could actually say something that cheesy out loud.'}
{2: 'So, that thing you wanted to do with me...', 3: '155'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I want you to come fly with me. In the aircraft my mom left here.', 4: '1', 18: '100013206'}
{2: 'What about the search for your fairy tale?', 3: '158'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well... we've looked everywhere at home, and my secret base, and through all of Mom's old books, but I still haven't found it.", 4: '1', 18: '100013207'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The town library might have a copy, but that can wait.', 4: '1', 18: '100013208'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The wind is just right today, perfect for two people to fly. If we don't go now, we might miss our chance!", 4: '1', 18: '100013209'}
{3: 'She gently tightens her grip on your hand. Behind the mist in her eyes lies a heartfelt sincerity, unmistakable and true.'}
{3: "It's rare to see you so excited about something... How could I say no to that?"}
{3: 'She excitedly grabs your hand and pulls you toward Gray Wing.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront33.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Together, you push down on the pedals, and the craft surges up the hillside.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: '—It takes off.'}
{3: "But contrary to all your hopes, it doesn't soar. Instead, it barely climbs, skimming the grass before lurching over the cliff's edge."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront33.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory537.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront33.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: "You're now airborne above the sea surface, but just barely. Gray Wing wobbles drunkenly through the air, threatening to plunge into the waves below at any second."}
{2: 'Liv, is the wind engine generating any power?', 3: '195'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes, but just barely. The wind's still not strong enough today. We're almost entirely on pedal power now...", 4: '1', 18: '100013211'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Don't worry, Commandant. Constructs are much stronger than humans. Just relax and leave this to me.", 4: '1', 18: '100013212'}
{2: '(Pedal harder)', 3: '201', 4: '(Lean backward)', 5: '205'}

{3: 'The thought of Liv facing this alone is unthinkable. It fuels you, and you drive your feet against the pedals with a desperate, newfound strength. Your exoskeleton whines in protest, its servos humming with a dangerous heat as it forces energy into your burning muscles.'}
{3: 'And then, a miracle—Gray Wing answers. The faltering craft bucks, then surges upward, climbing steadily as if lifted by your burst of force.'}
{3: "Liv is right. Even with your exoskeleton, human strength is nothing compared to a Construct's. You might as well let her handle everything."}
{3: 'The moment you stop pedaling, a miracle happens. The aircraft starts climbing higher and higher...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Phew... Looks like we caught an updraft. We can rest for a bit now.', 4: '1', 18: '100013213'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'If only the wind were stronger today... Gray Wing is built to climb higher as the wind grows stronger.', 4: '1', 18: '100013214'}
{2: 'What happens if the wind gets too strong?', 3: '213'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm not actually sure... This is my first time flying it, to be honest.", 4: '1', 18: '100013215'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But this aircraft did survive a category 10 windstorm once.', 4: '1', 18: '100013216'}
{2: "It's hard to picture your mother flying in this.", 3: '218'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'My mom came from a family of pilots. This was part of her dowry when she moved south to marry my dad.', 4: '1', 18: '100013217'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But she wasn't feeling well enough to fly, so Dad kept it in the yard. That way, she could still come sit inside whenever she had a moment.", 4: '1', 18: '100013218'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "When I was little, she'd tell me stories right here in this cockpit. I'd be sitting exactly where I am now.", 4: '1', 18: '100013219'}
{2: 'Is that why you wanted me to fly in it with you?', 3: '225'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well... yes. But that's not the only reason...", 4: '1', 18: '100013220'}
{3: "For some reason, her cheeks are flushed bright red. She seems to be straining, though her feet aren't even on the pedals."}
{3: "You should be riding an updraft. There's no reason for any exertion..."}
{2: 'Liv, are you alright?', 3: '230'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Without warning, the steady cabin lurches violently. Liv stumbles and collapses back into her seat. You stomp on the pedals, one hand flying out to catch her.'}
{3: "Your fingers touch a body gone completely limp. Despite no battle, she's in a state of total exhaustion."}
{2: "Liv... were you secretly using your frame's lifting power this whole time...?", 3: '241'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I wasn't! It's... it's just that the updraft suddenly dropped!", 4: '1', 18: '100013222'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Gray Wing drifts aimlessly, wobbly as the girl's confused emotions. You fight to adjust its course, wrestling it toward the shoreline."}
{3: 'Thud. Mid-flight, something tumbles from a shadowed corner.'}
{3: 'A thick book? You barely glimpse its cover before you crash onto the shallow shore in a staggering landing.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront33.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{3: 'After the brief, jarring flight, you and Liv finally push Gray Wing out of the shallow shore.'}
{2: 'So if we really need to fly, you could just carry me with your frame, right?', 3: '257', 4: "Maybe Gray Wing just doesn't like this weather.", 5: '264'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Umm... even if we used my frame's lifting power to fly instead...", 4: '1', 18: '100013223'}
{2: "Is there something wrong with using your frame's lifting power?", 3: '260'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's not that, exactly... It just feels different from soaring with the wind...", 4: '1', 18: '100013224'}
{3: "Now, for reasons she hasn't shared, Liv seems utterly determined to handle the flight using nothing but the raw power of nature itself."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Remember? Gray Wing is built to climb higher as the wind grows stronger.', 4: '1', 18: '100013225'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "That's right. It really does prefer constant, strong winds.", 4: '1', 18: '100013226'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But today the wind suddenly died down.', 4: '1', 18: '100013227'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'If we miss this chance, we might not get another day with winds this strong our entire vacation.', 4: '1', 18: '100013228'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Who knows when the next chance will be? Without a good gust, Gray Wing might not even get off the ground.', 4: '1', 18: '100013229'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "And if it can't fly... then we won't get the...", 4: '1', 18: '100013230'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Then we won't get the God of Wind's blessing...", 4: '1', 18: '100013231'}
{2: 'Blessing? What kind of blessing?', 3: '277', 4: '...', 5: '277'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'My mom said... according to legend, if you soar through the winds with someone you love, the God of Wind will bless you to be together for a lifetime.', 4: '1', 18: '100013232'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory752.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But... I really do believe in them.', 4: '1', 18: '100013233'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I believe that stories like those are truly happening, somewhere in the world.', 4: '1', 18: '100013234'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Liv stares at the ground, scuffing her foot through the sand. Absorbed in her frustration over the failed flight, she refuses to lift her flushed face.'}
{3: 'Hoping to comfort her, you produce the book that had tumbled from the cabin. You present it with a flourish, like a magic trick.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It might be from when my mother sat with me in Gray Wing and read me stories!', 4: '1', 18: '100013236'}
{3: 'Her eyes light up. She takes the book with delight, her previous disappointment replaced by rapt concentration.'}
{3: 'Fifteen minutes later, she finally looks up, her expression now unreadably complex.'}
{2: "Any luck? Is the story you're looking for in there?", 3: '311'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: "But it's okay. I still like these stories... You know, most of them start out so sad, but they always find a way to end happily. I guess that was just the author's style.", 4: '1', 18: '100013238'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Tilmin Kj{195|166}reste Liv. That's the author's name.", 4: '1', 18: '100013240'}
{3: 'Fairy tales by Liv... for Liv? You exchange a glance, mutual shock giving way to profound bewilderment.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This "Liv" must be the one who wrote that story.', 4: '1', 18: '100013241'}
{2: 'What makes you so sure all of a sudden?', 3: '324'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's all coming back to me. The stories, the pictures... Not only did I hear these stories from my mother, but the illustrations look so familiar too... I feel like I've seen them somewhere before.", 4: '1', 18: '100013242'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Actually... I think it was seeing a painting like this that made me remember the story in the first place... But it was just recently...', 4: '1', 18: '100013243'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory259.png'}
{3: 'The painting that once left Liv so entranced suddenly flashes through your mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1305.jpg'}
{2: 'At the art exhibition? In Babylonia?', 3: '338'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes! That's the one. Now, we just need to find out the illustrator's name...", 4: '1', 18: '100013244'}
{3: 'Together, you anxiously flip through the pages until you find the name at last—'}
{3: 'Vimine.'}
